name: HELL HUNTER - Anti-Nomen
description:
Hell Hunter: Anti-Nomen is the frightful story of Elyon, a dhampir, the son of a vampire and a human.

Elyon is a vampire hunter, living during our days in Transylvania: his main target is slaying Dracula, the Lord of Darkness.

In this game you will prepare to hunt Dracula, you will be chased by a herd of wolves and werewolves running on the border between life and death, you will be followed by an unbeatable creature obsessed by Elyon, and you will need to survive from the siege of a herd of revenants: just a glimpse of the dark and scary atmosphere of Hell Hunter!

Follow Elyon in this new horror adventure, will you be brave enough?

This is a horror adventure audiogame which features a real time battle system in which you attack and dodge enemy attacks and completely relies on stereo sound to hear where the attacks come from and how to dodge them. It's also story driven and uses a narrator voice for story and interactions.
